Name: OCTOPTICOM
About the game: OCTOPTICOM is an open-ended puzzle programming game about designing and optimizing optical computing devices. Use lasers, mirrors, filters and other components to read, transform and write sequences of colored squares. Solve a variety of light puzzles and find clever ways to make your solutions elegant and compact. Features Lasers 8 colors A lot of squares More than 40 levels of light programming Not a single line of assembly code required
